title: European Highroof campout 27/28/29 June '14 + pre 67 bus!

vwsplitbus wrote:
Lookin good!


Cheers Mike!




There is limited space on the fields!!.

I don't think the Highroof field will be full ( I do hope so!! ) but to all people considering to do the campout and coming down with a bus. I have only space for approx. 30 buses. Please put your name down to be sure of your spot!

Thanks.
